Insts.Name: KarplusStrong
Insts.Introduction: This is a pure algorithm based synthesizer of a Guitar like sound. See here for the algorithm

Insts.Name: SynthFontViena
Insts.Introduction: This is a Sound-Font freely available here. You'll need to use the "info.preset_index" property to set which preset to use.

Insts.Name: Piano_Sampler
Insts.Introduction: This is a sampler based instrument using multiple samples from here.
